statements: SELECT * FROM TrainingSession;
SELECT session_id, coach_name, start_time FROM TrainingSession WHERE coach_name = 'John';
SELECT video_url, end_time FROM TrainingSession WHERE start_time >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT session_id, technique_feedback FROM TrainingSession WHERE performance_feedback IS NULL;
SELECT coach_name, COUNT(*) AS session_count FROM TrainingSession GROUP BY coach_name ORDER BY session_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM TrainingSession WHERE coach_name = 'John' AND start_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY end_time DESC LIMIT 1;
SELECT session_id, coach_name, start_time, end_time FROM TrainingSession WHERE technique_feedback IS NOT NULL ORDER BY start_time ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT session_id, video_url, start_time, performance_feedback FROM TrainingSession WHERE end_time < '2022-12-31' AND (coach_name = 'Alice' OR coach_name = 'Bob') ORDER BY start_time DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT DISTINCT coach_name FROM TrainingSession WHERE technique_feedback LIKE '%good%' ORDER BY coach_name;
SELECT session_id, coach_name, video_url, technique_feedback FROM TrainingSession WHERE performance_feedback LIKE '%improve%' ORDER BY start_time ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM training_session;
SELECT training_session_id, session_date FROM training_session WHERE training_session_id = 1;
SELECT training_session_id, session_duration FROM training_session WHERE session_duration > 60;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_video_path FROM performance_feedback WHERE training_session_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM training_session JOIN performance_feedback ON training_session.training_session_id = performance_feedback.training_session_id;
SELECT * FROM training_session WHERE session_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31';
SELECT training_session_id, session_duration FROM training_session ORDER BY session_duration DESC;

SELECT training_session.training_session_id, performance_feedback.feedback_text FROM training_session JOIN performance_feedback ON training_session.training_session_id = performance_feedback.training_session_id WHERE performance_feedback.feedback_video_path IS NOT NULL;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_sessions, SUM(session_duration) AS total_duration FROM training_session;
SELECT DISTINCT session_date FROM training_session ORDER BY session_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Athletes;
SELECT athlete_id, name, age FROM Athletes WHERE skill_level = 'Beginner';
SELECT session_id, session_date, location FROM TrainingSessions ORDER BY session_date DESC;
SELECT name AS athlete_name, age AS athlete_age FROM Athletes WHERE age > 25;
SELECT session_id, COUNT(athlete_id) AS number_of_athletes FROM VideoFootage GROUP BY session_id HAVING COUNT(athlete_id) > 1;
SELECT * FROM TrainingSessions WHERE session_date = '2022-01-01' AND location = 'Gym A';
SELECT name, age FROM Athletes WHERE skill_level = 'Advanced' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT session_id, session_date, location, name FROM TrainingSessions JOIN Athletes ON TrainingSessions.coach_id = Athletes.athlete_id;
SELECT session_id, COUNT(footage_id) AS footage_count FROM VideoFootage GROUP BY session_id HAVING COUNT(footage_id) > 2;
SELECT Athletes.name, VideoFootage.video_link FROM Athletes JOIN VideoFootage ON Athletes.athlete_id = VideoFootage.athlete_id WHERE Athletes.age >= 25;
SELECT * FROM TrainingSessions WHERE session_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT session_id, session_date, session_duration FROM TrainingSessions WHERE coach_id = 1;
SELECT technique_name, description FROM Techniques WHERE technique_id = 3;
SELECT feedback, rating FROM PerformanceFeedback WHERE session_id = 2 AND technique_id = 3;
SELECT coach_id, coach_name, coach_email FROM Coaches WHERE coach_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT * FROM TrainingSessions WHERE coach_id = 1;
SELECT session_date, session_duration FROM TrainingSessions WHERE session_id > 5;
SELECT coach_name, coach_email FROM Coaches WHERE coach_id = 2;
SELECT session_date, session_duration, coach_name FROM TrainingSessions JOIN Coaches ON TrainingSessions.coach_id = Coaches.coach_id;
SELECT technique_name, description FROM Techniques ORDER BY technique_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM training_sessions;
SELECT session_id, coach_id FROM training_sessions WHERE session_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT athlete_id, name, age FROM athletes ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT technique_name, description FROM techniques WHERE technique_id = 3;
SELECT video_url, timestamp FROM video_analysis ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM training_sessions WHERE coach_id = 1;
SELECT athlete_id, name, age FROM athletes WHERE age > 20 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT technique_id, technique_name FROM techniques WHERE LENGTH(description) > 50;
SELECT session_id, video_url FROM training_sessions JOIN video_analysis ON training_sessions.video_url = video_analysis.video_url;

SELECT performance_feedback.session_id, performance_feedback.athlete_id, athletes.name, techniques.technique_name FROM performance_feedback JOIN athletes ON performance_feedback.athlete_id = athletes.athlete_id JOIN techniques ON performance_feedback.technique_id = techniques.technique_id;
